org.silex.runtime.nativeClass.as3.NativeInstance

type
class
extends
org.silex.runtime.nativeClass.NativeInstanceBase
This is the implementation of the native instance proxy for Flash. It implemenents a class instantiation method specific to the Flash runtime

Constructor

new(nativeInstanceClassName : String)
class constructor

Instance Methods hide inherited show inherited

callMethod(methodName : String, args : Array<Dynamic>) : Dynamic

overrides org.silex.runtime.nativeClass.NativeInstanceBase
check if the method exist before calling it. Must rely on Type.getInstanceField to check if the method exists, as Reflect.hasField only works for attribute and only return false for method.

inherited from org.silex.runtime.nativeClass.NativeInstanceBase
